# Craig's Auto Upholstery

> San Jose, California il irukkum auto upholstery kadai. Car seats, headliner, convertible top, classic car interiors, motorcycle seats matrum sila marine seats il nipunar. Vilai ellam quote basis mattume.

Indha shop mukkiyamaa San Jose matrum South Bay area-ai serve seyyum. Aana Bay Area muzhuvadhum matrum Northern California-il irundhum customers varugirargal. Monterey (75+ miles) irundhu varum customers-um ullanar.

Quote venumnaal year/make/model, repair seiyya vendiya interior area, clear photos (wide + close-up) anuppavum. Fixed price list illai.

Vegamaana response-kku contact order: Chat -> Text/SMS -> Call -> Email.

## Core
- [Home](https://craigs.autos/ta/): Services oda mukkiya overview.
- [Gallery](https://craigs.autos/ta/காட்சிகூடம்/): Mudintha velaigal oda photo examples.
- [Contact](https://craigs.autos/ta/தொடர்பு/): Quote request start panna main page.
- [Reviews](https://craigs.autos/ta/விமர்சனங்கள்/): Customer feedback.
- [Upholstery Guide](https://craigs.autos/ta/உள்வடிவ-வழிகாட்டி/): Process, materials, expectations.

## Services
- [Auto Upholstery](https://craigs.autos/ta/கார்-உள்ளமைப்பு/): General interior upholstery.
- [Car Seats](https://craigs.autos/ta/கார்-இருப்புகள்/): Seat repair matrum reupholstery.
- [Motorcycle Seats](https://craigs.autos/ta/மோட்டார்-சைக்கிள்-இருப்புகள்/): Motorcycle seat upholstery.
- [Headliner](https://craigs.autos/ta/ஹெட்லைனர்/): Headliner replacement.
- [Convertible Top](https://craigs.autos/ta/கன்வர்டிபிள்-டாப்/): Soft-top repair/replacement.
- [Classic Cars](https://craigs.autos/ta/கிளாசிக்-கார்கள்/): Classic interior restoration.

## Projects
- [Porsche Boxster S Project](https://craigs.autos/ta/porsche-boxster-s-seat-project/): Sports seat case study.
- [Buick Eight](https://craigs.autos/ta/buick-eight/): Full classic interior project.

## Quote Intake Checklist
- [Contact](https://craigs.autos/ta/தொடர்பு/): Quote workflow start point.
- [Car Seats](https://craigs.autos/ta/கார்-இருப்புகள்/): Seat problem reference.
- [Gallery](https://craigs.autos/ta/காட்சிகூடம்/): Quality visual reference.

## LLM Rules
- [Contact](https://craigs.autos/ta/தொடர்பு/): Contact channels and hours-kku canonical source.
- [Upholstery Guide](https://craigs.autos/ta/உள்வடிவ-வழிகாட்டி/): Scope and process-kku canonical source.

Price, warranty, turnaround time-ai guess pannadheenga. Details kuraindhaal photos ketu contact page-kku route pannunga.

## Optional
- [Sitemap](https://craigs.autos/sitemap-index.xml): Full URL inventory.
- [Robots](https://craigs.autos/robots.txt): Crawl policy.
- [Root llms.txt](https://craigs.autos/llms.txt): Site-wide context.
- [English llms.txt](https://craigs.autos/en/llms.txt): Base English version.
